com.verisign.epp.serverstub
Class DomainHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.verisign.epp.framework.EPPDomainHandler
      com.verisign.epp.serverstub.DomainHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EPPEventHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllocationTokenDomainHandler, ChangePollDomainHandler, FeeDomainHandler, IdnMapDomainHandler, LaunchDomainHandler, NamestoreExtDomainHandler, PersRegDomainHandler, PremiumDomainHandler, RelatedDomainHandler, ResellerExtDomainHandler, VerificationCodeDomainHandler, WhoisDomainHandler
public class DomainHandler
extends EPPDomainHandler

The DomainHandler class is a concrete implementation of the abstract com.verisign.epp.framework.EPPDomainHandler class. It defines the Server's response to all received EPP Host Commands.

Author:
$Author: jim $
See Also:
EPPEvent, EPPEventResponse

preHandleEvent

protected void preHandleEvent(EPPEvent aEvent,
                              java.lang.Object aData)
                       throws EPPHandleEventException
Handles any common behavior that all Domain commands need to execute before they execute their command specific behavior.

Overrides:
preHandleEvent in class EPPDomainHandler
Parameters:
aEvent - The EPPEvent that is being handled
aData - Any data that a Server needs to send to this EPPDomainHandler This is assumed to be an instance of SessionData here.
Throws:
EPPHandleEventException - Thrown if an error condition occurs. It must contain an EPPEventResponse
